name: Deema Affiliate link generator
author: Deema

sections.description:
Deema Affiliate link generator is the fast & easy way to implement Deema Affiliate links in your articles.

this plugin doesn’t collect any data from yor website.
sections.installation:
Simple installation

Deema Affiliate link generator plugin is available to install via the WordPress plugin library and you can install it directly from within your WordPress dashboard.

Manual installation

Alternatively, you can install manually:

  1. Download the Deema Affiliate link generator plugin as a zip file.
  2. Upload the folder deema-affiliate-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Configuration

After installation, go to deema affiliate link generator page in admin menu, and enter your Deema Affiliate general link address.
sections.faq:
Do I need a Deema Affiliate account to use this plugin?

Yes. You can sign up for a free Deema Affiliate account which provides access to all our features.

I’ve set up Deema Affiliate link generator plugin, what now?

go to deema affiliate link generator page in admin menu, and enter your Deema Affiliate general link address.
now in your articles you can use affiliate-link shortcode

Where can I find out more about Deema Affiliate ?

to learn more about Deema Affiliate.
برای آشنایی بیشتر با سیستم همکاری در فروش دیما اینجا کلیک کنید.

How do I remove Deema Affiliate link generator from my site?

You can uninstall this plugin at any time to remove Deema Affiliate link generator from your site.
* if you remove or disable this plugin used deema affiliate-link shortcodes don’t work correctly until you enable plugin again.
